survey.name: Survey

samplesource.title: Open Survey
samplesource.invalid: You are missing information in the URL. Please verify the URL with the original invite
samplesource.completed: It seems you have already entered this survey.
samplesource.exit: Thank you for taking our survey.
Thank you for taking our survey. Your efforts are greatly appreciated!
Thank you for taking our survey.

radio.label: QS0_CONSENT
radio.title: The survey data collected will be used for research purposes only, and all responses you provide are voluntary, anonymous and will be processed in aggregate to assist us and our client in understanding audiences like you. All information collected and processed will be done in accordance with local and international data protection laws.
radio.comment: Based on the information above, do you agree to participate?

radio.label: QS1
radio.title: What is your gender?

number.label: QS2
number.title: How old are you?
number.comment: Please type your age in the box below.

radio.label: QS3_US
radio.title: What state do you live in?
radio.row: I do not live in the U.S.

radio.label: hQS3a_US
radio.row: Northeast: CT, ME, MA, NH, RI, VT, NJ, NY, PA
Midwest: IL, IN, MI, OH, WI, IA, KS, MN, MO, NE, ND, SD
South: DE, DC, FL, GA, MD, NC, SC, VA, WV, AL, KY, MS, TN, AR, LA, OK, TX
West: AZ, CO, ID, MT, NV, NM, UT, WY, AK, CA, HI, OR, WA

radio.label: QS4_US
radio.title: What is the last grade in school you completed?
radio.row: Post-graduate degree (e.g. MA, MBA, LLD, PhD)

radio.label: QS5_US
radio.title: Thinking about your annual household income in 2021, which of the following categories best describes your total household income that year?

radio.label: QS6
radio.title: How often do you follow public policy matters in the news?
radio.row: Nearly every day or every day
I do not focus on public policy matters

radio.label: QS7
radio.title: How often do you follow business news and information?
radio.row: Nearly every day or every day

radio.label: QS9
radio.title: Do you consider yourself to be of Hispanic or Latino/a/x origin?

checkbox.label: QS8
checkbox.title: Which of the following best describes your racial background?
checkbox.row: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

radio.label: QENTS0
radio.title: How familiar are you with the following [COMPANIES OR BRANDS]?
radio.col: Slightly familiar (I have heard the name but not much else)

text.label: QENTS0a
text.title: What words or phrases come to mind when you think about ?

radio.label: QENTS1
radio.title: Please indicate how much you trust the following [COMPANIES OR BRANDS] to do what is right, using a 9-point scale where one means that you "do not trust them at all" and nine means that you "trust them a great deal".
radio.col: Do not trust them at all

text.label: QENTS1a
text.title: You rated your trust in CLIENT as [PIPE-IN ENTS1/row1 RESPONSE]. Why do you trust [CLIENT] to do what is right?

text.label: QENTS1b
text.title: You rated your trust in CLIENT as [PIPE-IN ENTS1/row1 RESPONSE]. Why do you not trust [CLIENT] to do what is right?

radio.label: QENTS2
radio.title: How much do you agree or disagree that the following [COMPANIES OR BRANDS] are good at what they do?

radio.label: QENTS3
radio.title: How much do you agree or disagree that the following [COMPANIES OR BRANDS] are honest?

radio.label: QENTS4
radio.title: How much do you agree or disagree that the following [COMPANIES OR BRANDS] are keeping their promises?

radio.label: QENTS5
radio.title: How much do you agree or disagree that the following [COMPANIES OR BRANDS] are trying hard to have a positive impact on society?

radio.label: QENTS6
radio.title: How much do you agree or disagree that the following [COMPANIES OR BRANDS] are a good fit with who you are as a person?

survey.html: Now we would like to focus in more detail about how specific companies in [MARKET] perform on a set of specific behaviors.

radio.label: QENTS7_BRAND
radio.title: How much do you agree or disagree about the following statements about ?
radio.comment: Please use a 7-point scale where 1 means that you ‘strongly disagree’ and 7 means that you ‘strongly agree’.
radio.row: Creates products and services that put consumer safety first
Innovates and adapts to what people really need today
Does what is right by its customers
Does what is right by its employees
Consistently behaves in an ethical way
Is truthful and transparent in its communication
Keeps its promises, even when something goes wrong
Champions values & beliefs that matter that matter to me
Cares more about people than profit
Does what it takes to have a positive impact on the environment
Is relevant to my culture and my interests
Creates stories and experiences that are worth my time
Is a brand I would defend

radio.label: QENTS8
radio.title: How likely is it that you would recommend the following companies to a friend or colleague?

radio.label: QENTS9
radio.title: Have you read, heard or seen anything in the news about the following companies and was the news positive, negative or neutral?
radio.col: No, I did not read, see or hear any news

text.label: QENTS9_OPEN
text.title: What specifically did you see, hear, or read about [CLIENT]?
text.comment: Please be as specific as possible.

radio.label: QENTS9a
radio.title: Which of the following statements best describes the buzz about the following brands right now?
radio.comment: By “buzz” we mean what you are hearing about the brand in the news, on social media, or in conversations.
radio.col: Right now, the buzz about this brand is <u>very positive</u>
Right now, the buzz about this brand is <u>quite positive</u>
Right now, the buzz about this brand is <u>neutral</u>
Right now, the buzz about this brand is <u>quite negative</u>
Right now, the buzz about this brand is <u>very negative</u>
I haven’t heard much about this brand lately

text.label: QENTS9a_OPEN
text.title: What specifically did you see, hear, or read about ?
text.comment: Please be as specific as possible.

radio.label: QENTS10
radio.title: Based on what you know about the following companies, would you say its best days are ahead or its best days are behind it?
radio.col: Its best days are behind it

radio.label: QENTS11
radio.title: When thinking about the following companies, which statement below describes whether you use their products or services?
radio.col: I currently use their products or services
I used to use their products or services, but don’t now
I have never used their products or services

text.label: INT1
text.title: For the next few questions, we are going to show you a set of messages. These messages will focus on [INSERT FOCUS OF MESSAGE TESTING].

radio.label: Q1
radio.title: For the message below, please use the different colored markers to select any part of the message to indicate how you feel.

radio.label: Q2
radio.title: How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements about the message listed below?
radio.row: This is directed at someone like me

radio.label: Q3
radio.title: Please indicate how much you trust [CLIENT] to do what is right, based on what you’ve heard today.
radio.comment:
Using a 9-point scale where 1 means that you “do not trust them at all” and 9 means that you “trust them a great deal”.

When evaluating , please think about the company as whole, rather than their specific products and services.
radio.col: I do not trust them at all
I trust them a great deal

survey.html: Finally, we’d like to the following questions that will be used for classification purposes, only.

radio.label: QD1
radio.title: Which of the following best describes your current employment status?

checkbox.label: QD2
checkbox.title: Which of the following areas best describes your current professional area of focus?

radio.label: QD3
radio.title: How would you describe your political beliefs?

number.label: QC2
number.title: In what year were you born?

survey.html: Those are all the questions we have for you today. Thank you for completing our survey.
